product_title: Kelsey High Waist Raw Hem Kick Flare Jeans
product_description: Ankle-length raw hems make a casual-cool statement on these stretch-kissed high-waist jeans with the perfect hint of flare.
product_details_and_care:
Ankle-length raw hems make a casual-cool statement on these stretch-kissed high-waist jeans with the perfect hint of flare.
